### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Burner Mining Drill at position (43.0, -84.0)

### Burner Inserter at position (3.5, 0.5)
Consists of a burner inserter at position (3.5, 0.5) and a wooden chest at position (2.5, 0.5)

### Burner Inserter at position (0.5, 3.5)

### Steam Engine at position (6.5, 6.5)
Consists of a steam engine at position (6.5, 6.5) with no input liquid and no fluid present in connections

### Electricity Group with id 4543
Consists of small electric poles at positions (2.5, 2.5), (4.5, 5.5), (8.5, 9.5), and (2.5, 1.5) with a voltage of 0

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure the entity has enough space to accept the items before inserting
- Make sure the entity can accept the type of item being inserted
- Check if the entity is already full before attempting to insert items

### Errors when researching technologies
- Ensure the lab has a power source before researching technologies
- Check if the technology is already being researched before attempting to research it again

### Errors when using prototypes
- Ensure the prototype exists and is spelled correctly before using it
- Check if the prototype is a valid item or entity before attempting to use it

### Errors when extracting or harvesting items
- Ensure the entity has items to extract or harvest before attempting to do so
- Check if the entity is already empty before attempting to extract or harvest items

### Errors when connecting entities to power networks
- Ensure the entity can be connected to a power network before attempting to do so
- Check if the power network is already connected to the entity before attempting to connect it again

### Errors when using insert_item function
- Ensure the item exists in the inventory before attempting to insert it
- Check if the entity can accept the item being inserted before attempting to insert it

### Errors when using set_research function
- Ensure the technology exists and is spelled correctly before attempting to research it
- Check if the lab has enough power to research the technology before attempting to do so
